sentences.sContent: An older unit, the lumen per square foot, or foot-candle, has become obsolete .
sentences.sContent_eng: An older unit, the lumen per square foot, or foot-candle, has become obsolete .
sentences.sCn: 一种较老的单位是每平方米英尺的流明数，即英寸烛光，这种单位已经废除。

synos.tran: 流明（光束的能量单位）；（管状器官内的）内腔

trans.tranOther: the derived SI unit of luminous flux; the flux emitted in a solid angle of 1 steradian by a point source having a uniform intensity of 1 candela
